gradebook 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Function reference

Gradescope Data Functions

These functions are to validate and process the Gradescope data.

Validate Gradescope Data

read_gs()
Read Gradescope .csv
check_data_format()
Check Formatting of Gradescope Data
get_id_cols()
Get the ID Columns for Gradescope Data
get_assignments()
Get the Assignment Names for Gradescope Data
drop_ungraded_assignments()
Drop Ungraded Assignments

Process Gradescope Data

process_gs()
Process Gradescope Data
process_id()
Process Student IDs
get_duplicate_ids()
Get Duplicate Student IDs
pivot_gs()
Convert GS data to longer table

Policy File Functions

These functions are to validate and process the policy file.

flatten_policy()
Reshape policy file from nested to flat

Lateness Functions

These functions are to apply any lateness policies from the policy file to the processed Gradescope data.

calculate_lateness()
Compute Lateness This function computes scores after lateness policy has been applied.
calculate_scores_after_lateness()
Calculate Scores after Lateness This function uses the merged pivotted data + lateness table to compute raw scores after lateness.
create_lateness_table()
Create an Lateness Table This function creates an assignment table where each row is an assignment with its category and relevant lateness information.
copy_element_to_children()
Copy list element to child assignment categories

Grading Functions

These functions are to grade the processed Gradescope data based on the criteria in the processed policy file

get_category_grades()
Get category grades for all students
apply_clobber()
Apply Clobber Policy
get_letter_grades()
Get letter grades for all students
get_one_grade()
Get one category grade
equally_weighted() weighted_by_points() max_score() min_score() none()
Aggregate assignment scores

Demo Items

These items are used to demonstrate the functionality of this package.

gs_demo
Gradescope Demo Data
policy_demo
Policy Demo File
